thread.section_title: UnlockBase Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of UnlockBase | unlockbase.com
thread.title: Therese

author: Therese
title: Therese
text: Received the code after 2 days, such great service! I was frustrated at first because when I turned on my phone after receiving the code it was no longer asking for a network unlock pin but a PUK. I thought the unlocking wrecked my phone. The PUK code didn't work, also customer service said they only unlocked phones not PUK; after telling them I know it was asking for something else prior they didn't understand. If this message comes up for you just put in all the codes they give you. By the time I put the 4th code in and pressed unlock the message changed!! The 5th code then unlocked the phone!! The site really does help, it's cheaper than other stores for sure!!
